title: The Poor Rich Girl: The Arabella Academy Chronicles
description: All throughout her high school career at the Arabella Academy, Eva St. George was the natural leader of the popular group. The St. George family has always been known in the community for their vast wealth and with that wealth came power. However, when Eva's family falls victim to a ponzi scheme, their ruin is on the tip of everyone's lips. Can Eva find her dignity while using her wiles to help the St. George family rise from the ashes?
author: Ashley Gallegos
